name: Wacky Dice Shooter
description:
Wacky Dice Shooter was made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. The theme was "roll of the dice" so we decided to make a shooter where the dice determines your fate in the game. 

Controls:

W/A/S/D - Movement

Mouse Movement - Look

M - Mute Audio

Left Click - Shoot

R - Spend 100 Points to reduce the time taken for next dice roll

T - Spend 200 Points to increase time taken for next dice roll

Known Issues:

  • WebGL builds of the game can sometimes have some framerate issues when using explosions, do use the Wndows version if you face these issues.
  • After prolonged play, some users report to be facing issues of running out of Ammunition

Description:

The enemies are attacking! You have a gun, a dice, and perhaps lady luck on your side. 

The dice decides whether you'll have an advantage or disadvantage in battle and you'll have to spend points to try your luck with the dice again.

How long will you survive?
